rows.label: tev001493_MSG0001
rows.name: Fancy meeting you here, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0002
rows.name: As you can see, I was just having my gun serviced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0003
rows.name:
I've been working with her since we were back
on Earth. She knows exactly what I want,
and always tunes it to perfection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0004
rows.name:
How about you, [ST:playername ]?
How do you keep your weapons maintained?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_JNK0010
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: tev001493_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Irina that you don't really perform maintenance.

rows.label: tev001493_JNK0020
rows.name: Boast

rows.label: tev001493_SEL0021
rows.name:
Brag about your rigorous and amazing
personalized maintenance routine.

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0005
rows.name: What, ever?! Wow. You must like living on the edge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0006
rows.name:
But don't you understand that if you don't keep your
equipment optimized at all times, something is certain
to go horribly, horribly wrong?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0007
rows.name:
Armor is one thing—that just hurts you if it fails.
But weapons protect the lives of friends and comrades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0008
rows.name:
And if you value them, you need to do everything
possible to protect them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0009
rows.name:
Although if I had to guess, I'd say that Lin probably
cleans and maintains your weapon while you're asleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0010
rows.name:
That girl is always looking out for her friends.
Meanwhile, you're so careless you haven't even noticed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0011
rows.name:
Then you're the sort of [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]people can count on.
No wonder the colonel took you under her wing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0012
rows.name:
Armor is one thing—that just hurts you if it fails.
But weapons protect the lives of friends and comrades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0013
rows.name:
If you don't keep them in perfect condition, you might
not be able to give your all when your team needs you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0014
rows.name: Have you heard of a man named Mondo, by the way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_JNK0030
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: tev001493_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim to know all about Mondo.

rows.label: tev001493_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: tev001493_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you don't recognize the name.

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0015
rows.name: Heh. You guys must have met, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0016
rows.name: He's from Lao's team. Real low-key guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0017
rows.name:
Give Mondo a gun you want serviced,
and he'll do you better than any mechanic in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0018
rows.name:
Gwin was so impressed, he actually asked to be
Mondo's apprentice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0019
rows.name:
So lately, whenever Gwin has a free moment,
he disassembles his weapon and gets to work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm sure it's great practice, but...
Well, it's starting to get weird.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0021
rows.name:
Like, when he's done? He always spends a few
moments stroking it with the tips of his fingers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0022
rows.name:
And then—I kid you not—he LICKS it!
It's maybe the most revolting thing I've ever seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0023
rows.name:
So next time you run into Gwin, tell him not to be
such a creep-o, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0024
rows.name:
Give Mondo a gun you want serviced, and he'll do you
better than any mechanic in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0025
rows.name:
Gwin actually became his apprentice and was starting
to learn his secrets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0026
rows.name:
But I guess Mondo won't be able to teach Gwin
anything again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0027
rows.name:
To think that so skilled a BLADE could be brought
down like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0028
rows.name:
Even when your weapons are in pristine condition,
I guess we all eventually face a threat that's just too
big to handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0029
rows.name:
When my time comes, I don't want to be regretting
that I cut corners prepping my gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0030
rows.name: You can't ignore the little things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001493_MSG0031
rows.name:
Sometimes the little things are all that keep us BLADEs
alive out there.[ST:wait ]
